name: Dwunastu gniewnych ludzi
description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

name: Hot Fuzz - Ostre psy
description: A skilled London police officer is transferred to a small town with a dark secret.

name: Ivan's Childhood
description: During World War II, orphaned Ivan bonds with three Soviet officers while seeking revenge against the Nazis.

name: Aftersun
description: A father and daughter wrestle with life's complexities during a summer vacation.

name: Manhunter
description: An FBI profiler is on the trail of a serial killer who targets families.

name: Sound of metal
description: A drummer begins to lose his hearing and has to come to terms with a future that will be filled with silence.

name: Boogie Nights
description: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

name: Blow-up
description: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

name: A Man Escaped
description: A French Resistance fighter plots his escape from a Nazi prison during World War II.

name: Monty Python i Święty Graal
description: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many silly obstacles.

name: 2001: Odyseja kosmiczna
description: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world's most advanced super computer.

name: Primer
description: Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.

name: Przed wschodem słońca
description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna.

name: Drive
description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor in this action drama.

name: Śmierć w Wenecji
description: While staying in Venice, a composer becomes increasingly obsessed with a young boy.

name: Moja noc u Maud
description: A pious Catholic engineer vows to marry a blond, blue-eyed woman but finds himself spending an eventful night with a divorced woman.

name: Shrek 2
description: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen.

name: Casablanca
description: A cynical nightclub owner protects an old flame and her husband from Nazis in Morocco.

name: Siedmiu samurajów
description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

name: Siódma pieczęć
description: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.
